OrgName.entry: BIG ISSUE IN THE NORTH, THE

Desc.entry: A registered charity which aims to tackle homelessness by offering homeless people or vulnerably housed people the opportunity to earn a legitimate income through selling the Big Issue in the North magazine. Also provides marginalised people the opportunity to access services, through signposting and referring to a number of locally and nationally based agencies, for healthcare, housing, substance misuse treatment and financial services. Self or any referral.

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
